channel.title: [News] New US church leader says homosexuality no sin
channel.description:
[url=http://news.yahoo.com/s/nm/20060619/ts_nm/religion_episcopals_bishop_dc]News Source[/url]: New US church leader says homosexuality no sin
Description: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Newly elected leader of the U.S. Episcopal Church Bishop Katharine Jefferts Schori said on Monday she believed homosexuality was no sin and homosexuals were created by God to love people of the same gender.
More power to yeah church leader. Getting tired of so many people defaming homosexuals just because they are different. Why do people hate them so much anyways? They're just people who like to do 1 particular thing in a different way. If you don't like them, then you have a problem. They may have been born gay, but no reason to make fun of them. And news flash, you can't catch 'gay' as some call it. It's not a disease.
There was a poll 2 months ago or a month ago here about gay rights. Something like 17 people said yeah and 30 people said no because they think they are weird. Dumb reason, but everything wrong normally has a dumb reason. What do you think?
Edit: If you agree or disagree, please actually say why. It's annoying when people just say, "I disagree" and then end the post.
~Ron :rolleyes:

item.title: [News] New US church leader says homosexuality no sin
item.dc:creator: @BlackThursday BlackThursday
item.description:
@BlackThursday wrote:

[quote=“ruler, post:109, topic:4025”][quote author=Ron link=topic=5052.msg52307#msg52307 date=1151033149]

Are you black? Didn’t mean that to be offensive or anything. Just wondering. And also, I am in no way a christian like that.

Half black lol. I’m brown.

Dude ron why are you so fucking up for gay rights…I mean seriously its a lost cause, they dont belong becuase if they did god would have given men Vaginas… or if you like science, evolution would have given men vaginas.

So stop the humanitarian work… gays dont belong.

EDIT:

Unless they live in San Diego.

This is the perfect example for the US to have Moral classes like the rest of the world. Teaches you to have morals even though I know the US looks down on things such as that :rolleyes: .

Like I said in my previous posts, Try to imagine yourselves in their shoes and try to be sensitive. I know that’s also looked down upon but you know, people can change sometimes.

One last thing. I appreciate your wisdom on gay people and bible and whatever. Do not say what I should or should not do. If I wanted to do ‘humanitarian work’ which I call ethical, I would do it. I have a huge problem with anyone telling me what to do or not to do.

Haha, probably how gays are told to become straight and they have a problem with people telling them what to do. :rolleyes:

[/quote]
morals steem from religion

For men thier are two burst of testerone during embroyonic development. The latter affects the brain. Thus physical males can be born with female brains if the 2nd fails to occur. Many reasons can cause, drugs, stress on mother ect.

However females are alwasy born with female brains.

So gay men are naturally occuring.

However then insues the environment, which can greatly affect. Women not being chased after or being cheated/betrayed on seems to be the biggest reason for becoming lesbians. Same can occur for males.

This is entriely environmental whether it be random mistakes, drug use or stress during enbryonic development. Then ensues the social enviroment and experiences. Their is no gene you can set.

I believe at a level people can control this, they are not trapped in condition. I find the vocal gay culture to be out of hand. In florida the themes parks have “gay days” to attract gay tourists. Never go to the parks during this time, they have sex in public.[/quote]

Thats the reason I oppose it. I dont care if they want to buttfuck in their houses but when you see two men in public kissing, its just wierd. AND they have these “bath houses” and shit. Its just wrong, if they want to be treated like regular citizens than they should act like regular citizens.

Read full topic

[/quote]

Dude ron why are you so fucking up for gay rights…I mean seriously its a lost cause, they dont belong becuase if they did god would have given men Vaginas… or if you like science, evolution would have given men vaginas.

So stop the humanitarian work… gays dont belong.

EDIT:

Unless they live in San Diego.

This is the perfect example for the US to have Moral classes like the rest of the world. Teaches you to have morals even though I know the US looks down on things such as that :rolleyes: .

Like I said in my previous posts, Try to imagine yourselves in their shoes and try to be sensitive. I know that’s also looked down upon but you know, people can change sometimes.

One last thing. I appreciate your wisdom on gay people and bible and whatever. Do not say what I should or should not do. If I wanted to do ‘humanitarian work’ which I call ethical, I would do it. I have a huge problem with anyone telling me what to do or not to do.

Haha, probably how gays are told to become straight and they have a problem with people telling them what to do. :rolleyes:[/quote]
morals steem from religion

For men thier are two burst of testerone during embroyonic development. The latter affects the brain. Thus physical males can be born with female brains if the 2nd fails to occur. Many reasons can cause, drugs, stress on mother ect.

However females are alwasy born with female brains.

So gay men are naturally occuring.

However then insues the environment, which can greatly affect. Women not being chased after or being cheated/betrayed on seems to be the biggest reason for becoming lesbians. Same can occur for males.

This is entriely environmental whether it be random mistakes, drug use or stress during enbryonic development. Then ensues the social enviroment and experiences. Their is no gene you can set.

I believe at a level people can control this, they are not trapped in condition. I find the vocal gay culture to be out of hand. In florida the themes parks have “gay days” to attract gay tourists. Never go to the parks during this time, they have sex in public.

item.title: [News] New US church leader says homosexuality no sin
item.dc:creator: @rabcarl rabcarl
item.description:
@rabcarl wrote:

I think that gay people are wrong, but just befcause they’re wrong they shouldn’t be treated any worse than anyone else. It’s their choice to be gay, and I might not agree with it, but that doesn’t make them any worse as a person. What I’m not okay with is people posting on this forum:

Desired user name:

The bible is a sick and ugly little book, but it does make great toilet paper!

Why? Because it’s utter ignorance. Also, the people who are posting this trash are using this topic as a springboard for their own opinions on something totally irrelevant to the topic at hand.

As for the priest: He is a moron. Why would God destroy Sodom and Gomorah in the old testament for the sole reason of the cities being infested with homosexuals if He had nothing against it?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

My view on homosexuality. It is a sin but to me all sin is equal. It all seperates us from GOD and I also believe that through Christ all sins will be forgiven. If all sin is equal then homosexuals and us are equal because we all sin. I'm cool with all of the gays and lesbians.

I wish all sin was equal, but I don’t think so. It would be sad if all this time I’ve been using the lords name in vain, I could have been raping people and burning down orphanages.

I also have another belief but I won't even bother talking about it because everyone will flame me for it even though it is the truth.

Go for it.

Read full topic

item.title: [News] New US church leader says homosexuality no sin
item.dc:creator: @Rambit_Td Rambit Td
item.description:
@Rambit_Td wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:18, topic:4025”]Ok the bible also says insest is wrong and im not saying it isnt… but:
If adam was the first man on earth, and eve was the first woman on earth (As the bible says) how
the hell did the human race continue? Because adam has sex with eve yada yada yada… they have kids… now how do their kids reproduce
a) they have sex with their brother/sister
b)they have sex with their mother/father
take that christianity and all other religions who use the bible…
also i asked a couple of really holy christian this and they just said some crap about god loving everyone… i hope not to get the same replys…[/quote]
This was before GOD told the human race that incest was wrong… The only rule in the beggining was not to eat from the Tree of Life, then we broke that.

My view on homosexuality. It is a sin but to me all sin is equal. It all seperates us from GOD and I also believe that through Christ all sins will be forgiven. If all sin is equal then homosexuals and us are equal because we all sin. I’m cool with all of the gays and lesbians.

Also I believe that it is a choice to be homosexual or hetrosexual. Why do I think this? Because there was a time in my life when I could have chosen to be either straight or gay and I chose straight.

I also have another belief but I won’t even bother talking about it because everyone will flame me for it even though it is the truth.

Read full topic

@Ron wrote:

All I do is read the news and they had an article on homosexuality on primates and on all those bullshit articles on only humans and whatever else enjoy sex when EVERY SINGLE organism enjoys sex. I hate when the church tries to tell us otherwise. They are normally always behind it because they want to get it into our heads that we are different man, but we aren’t. We’re animals. We may consider ourselves civilized but we art still animals.

item.title: [News] New US church leader says homosexuality no sin
item.dc:creator: @philodespotos philodespotos
item.description:
@philodespotos wrote:

[quote=“daycrawler, post:92, topic:4025”]Ya, you left out this part.
The assertion that the use of this image qualifies as fair use has been disputed by one or more individuals. Further information may be available below or on the image’s talk page. Please provide a rationale as to why this image qualifies as fair use. If no acceptable rationale can be provided, this image may be nominated for deletion in the future.[/quote]
Uh.

That’s a standard notice about the use of particular images and possible copyright violations by using them on a site which requires them to be usable under the GFDL.

It doesn’t pertain in any way whatsoever to what I said.

As I said to you on the other thread: “please make an effort to have the slightest bloody idea what you’re talking about.”

Read full topic
item.source: [News] New US church leader says homosexuality no sin

item.title: [News] New US church leader says homosexuality no sin
item.dc:creator: @daycrawler daycrawler
item.description:
@daycrawler wrote:

[quote=“philodespotos, post:90, topic:4025”]Doodeedoo. You ask for sources, meanwhile you didn’t cite yours and attributed it to “google.” But, nevertheless:

Homosexuality in some 450 species: http://www.sfgate.com/cgi-bin/article.cgi?f=/c/a/2004/02/07/MNG3N4RAV41.DTL
Non-productive interspecies mating: http://www.current-biology.com/content/article/abstract?uid=PIIS0960982205001041
A chimp who masturbates with shoes: http://www.mysanantonio.com/news/metro/stories/MYSA101904.01B.Chimp_homes.7bca96.html http://www.drsusanblock.com/editorial/foot_fetish.htm
Horses masturbate regularly: http://www3.vet.upenn.edu/labs/equinebehavior/hvnwkshp/hv02/mcdonnell.htm http://www.petplace.com/horses/breeding-soundness-examination-of-the-stallion/page2.aspx
A kangaroo masturbating on television: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Image:M90.org_kangeroo_film_still.png
Animals in captivity frequently resort to male-male and female-female pairs: http://query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=FA0C1EF83A5F0C748CDDAB0894DC404482 – For your convenience: http://www.bugmenot.com/view/www.nytimes.com – However, I can’t get in to nytimes.com at the moment due to site issues, so I haven’t verified this one myself – These gay pairs also occur in the wild; see the article from sfgate.com above.

A list of animals which have been observed as participating in homosexual relationships (or just sex). These are, of course, not cited, so it’s possible that some don’t belong:

en.wikipedia.org

List of animals displaying homosexual behavior

For these animals, there is documented evidence of homosexual behavior of one or more of the following kinds: sex, courtship, affection, pair bonding, or parenting, as noted in researcher and author Bruce Bagemihl's 1999 book Biological Exuberance: Animal Homosexuality and Natural Diversity. Bagemihl writes that the presence of same-sex sexual behavior was not "officially" observed on a large scale until the 1990s due to possible observer bias caused by social attitudes towards nonheterosexual p...

A citation on Wikipedia which I’m currently trying to get ahold of, which documents female masturbation “involving primarily direct stimulation of the clitoris,” an organ which has only a primary function of pleasure: Bruce Bagemihl: Biological Exuberance: Animal Homosexuality and Natural Diversity. St. Martin’s Press, 1999.

However, I’ve found a number of reviews via google:
http://home.planet.nl/~gkorthof/korthof62.htm
http://www.newscientist.com/channel/life/mg18925332.200.html
http://www.subversions.com/french/pages/science/animals.html

Most notably:
http://www.salon.com/it/feature/1999/03/cov_15featurea.html which makes note of the description of the clitoral stimulation, of particular interest to us here.

In interest of space, here’s the first page of google, peruse the rest yourself at your leisure: http://www.google.com/search?q=Bruce+Bagemihl&start=0

A further list of reviews; I didn’t read anything from here, you may want to:
http://www.findarticles.com/p/search?tb=art&qt=“Bruce+Bagemihl”

As I continue to go through Google, I can’t find anyone attempting to refute his claims. Maybe I missed something. Feel free to look.

This is all from a single page on Wikipedia that took me roughly 15 seconds to find, probably another 10 minutes to read. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Animal_sexuality

Maybe Wikipedia is edited entirely by people who are inherently biased and want to demonstrate that animals aren’t just machines which hump to reproduce and nothing more.

But, let’s make a quick note: originally, you offer dolphins as being the only other animal to enjoy sex. Then, you implicitly have to expand this to bonobos, as whatever little trivia site you’ve quoted includes them; you don’t directly acknowledge that, but in good faith, you probably just didn’t think it was necessary. Okay, so some female animals masturbate in a way that could only be linked to pleasure. Well, maybe there are just a few more than you weren’t aware of. Alright, a couple of animals happen to have sex with their own gender, or even form entirely non-productive sexual pairs and yet hump like mad anyway. That’s still just a handful more to add to the list…

See the trend here?

Vast generalizations, or tiny overdeterminations, tend not to be a good idea.[/quote]
Ya, you left out this part.
The assertion that the use of this image qualifies as fair use has been disputed by one or more individuals. Further information may be available below or on the image’s talk page. Please provide a rationale as to why this image qualifies as fair use. If no acceptable rationale can be provided, this image may be nominated for deletion in the future.

Read full topic

Non-productive interspecies mating: http://www.current-biology.com/content/article/abstract?uid=PIIS0960982205001041
A chimp who masturbates with shoes: http://www.mysanantonio.com/news/metro/stories/MYSA101904.01B.Chimp_homes.7bca96.html http://www.drsusanblock.com/editorial/foot_fetish.htm

List of animals displaying homosexual behavior

For these animals, there is documented evidence of homosexual behavior of one or more of the following kinds: sex, courtship, affection, pair bonding, or parenting, as noted in researcher and author Bruce Bagemihl's 1999 book Biological Exuberance: Animal Homosexuality and Natural Diversity. Bagemihl writes that the presence of same-sex sexual behavior was not "officially" observed on a large scale until the 1990s due to possible observer bias caused by social attitudes towards nonheterosexual p...

A citation on Wikipedia which I’m currently trying to get ahold of, which documents female masturbation “involving primarily direct stimulation of the clitoris,” an organ which has only a primary function of pleasure: Bruce Bagemihl: Biological Exuberance: Animal Homosexuality and Natural Diversity. St. Martin’s Press, 1999.

However, I’ve found a number of reviews via google:
http://home.planet.nl/~gkorthof/korthof62.htm
http://www.newscientist.com/channel/life/mg18925332.200.html
http://www.subversions.com/french/pages/science/animals.html

Most notably:
http://www.salon.com/it/feature/1999/03/cov_15featurea.html which makes note of the description of the clitoral stimulation, of particular interest to us here.

In interest of space, here’s the first page of google, peruse the rest yourself at your leisure: http://www.google.com/search?q=Bruce+Bagemihl&start=0

A further list of reviews; I didn’t read anything from here, you may want to:
http://www.findarticles.com/p/search?tb=art&qt=“Bruce+Bagemihl”

As I continue to go through Google, I can’t find anyone attempting to refute his claims. Maybe I missed something. Feel free to look.

This is all from a single page on Wikipedia that took me roughly 15 seconds to find, probably another 10 minutes to read. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Animal_sexuality

Maybe Wikipedia is edited entirely by people who are inherently biased and want to demonstrate that animals aren’t just machines which hump to reproduce and nothing more.

But, let’s make a quick note: originally, you offer dolphins as being the only other animal to enjoy sex. Then, you implicitly have to expand this to bonobos, as whatever little trivia site you’ve quoted includes them; you don’t directly acknowledge that, but in good faith, you probably just didn’t think it was necessary. Okay, so some female animals masturbate in a way that could only be linked to pleasure. Well, maybe there are just a few more than you weren’t aware of. Alright, a couple of animals happen to have sex with their own gender, or even form entirely non-productive sexual pairs and yet hump like mad anyway. That’s still just a handful more to add to the list…

See the trend here?

Vast generalizations, or tiny overdeterminations, tend not to be a good idea.
